General.Name: Central China Land Media Co Ltd
General.Description: Central China Land Media CO.,LTD engages in the editing and publishing, printing and reproduction, marketing and distribution, and material supply of books, periodicals, newspapers, electronic audio-visual products, online publications, and other media products. The company offers textbooks for middle and primary schools, and dictionaries; and reference, policies and current affairs reading, history, political governance theory, youth ideological education, educational guidance, scientific and technological, contemporary and modern literature, art and literary theories, ancient, local chronicles, agricultural science and technology, and rural culture books; teaching materials; and electronic publications. It is also involved in the copyright trading, asset management, capital operation, cultural and creative planning, technical services and consultation, and exhibition activities; advertising agency; printing of packaging and decoration; general freight; sales of paper, paper products, and advertising products; binding; import and export of goods; technology import and export; real estate development, operation, and leasing; operating leasing of construction machinery and equipment; sales of building materials and decorative materials; and provision of business management and real estate information consulting services. The company was founded in 1989 and is based in Zhengzhou, China. Central China Land Media CO.,LTD is a subsidiary of Central China Publishing & Media Investment Holding Group Co., Ltd.
General.Address: China (Henan) Publishing Industrial Park, Zhengzhou, China, 450016
